name: rail-decon-planner
title: Rail Deconstruction Planner
author: fgardt
description:
Provides a special deconstruction planner (ALT + X) that can mark entire rail segments for deconstruction at once. You can also just press the same hotkey while hovering a rail or signal to mark it for deconstruction.

Known limitation: deconstruction/deletion of ghosts is not possible.
